game.title: The Dragon's Desolation
game.#text:
Objective: Defeat the mighty Dragon
	 Description: The Dragon has ravaged the nearby village.
	 Reward: 5000 gold coins and Legendary Dragon Slayer Sword
	 Quest-Giver: King Arthur
	tasks:
			1. Find clues about Dragon's location
			2. Track down the Dragon
			3. Defeat the Dragon
